listProblem.comment: Const property name 'KotlinBinaryCompatibilityValidator' doesn't match regex '[A-Z][_A-Zd]*'
listProblem.detailsInfo:
Reports `const` property names that do not follow the recommended naming conventions.


Consistent naming allows for easier code reading and understanding.
According to the [Kotlin official style guide](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/coding-conventions.html#property-names),
`const` properties should use uppercase underscore-separated names.

**Example:**


      const val Planck: Double = 6.62607015E-34

A quick-fix renames the property:


      const val PLANCK: Double = 6.62607015E-34
